entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
